text: Do you remember the moment we meet ? I will certainly never forget.
You did so many trajects for seeing me. I felt bad for letting you move in the night from Antipolo to Manila or the contrary.
Our first trip, we went to Tagaytay just few day after we met. It was fun, I loved it !
You introduce myself to your friend for the first time. I learn a lot about you but from someone else this time.
I started to share with you my every day. Even going to the grocery was a good time to chat you. Is there a day I did not chat you ?
Walking up everyday beside you was the best mornings in my whole life. How many time did I just stare at you sleeping peacefully ?
Everyday, I cooked for you and you were surprize I actually could cook. I told you, I am good house wife. Haha !
I was really happy when you send me this picture. You were smiling with my gift in your hands.
We went out with some of your friends once again in Metrowalk. It was cool. I like this moment where we were whispering to each other.
You wanted to sleep but the weak drinker I became die before you even get tipsy. Ouchhh !
You made me discover Taft. And Once again, I ended up dead. It was a real challenge for you to take me home. Sorry, Bebe.
First time for me, I went to you in Antipolo. We went to the concert there and have some fun.
Haha we went for the first time in ACE Spa. You were so sexy in your swim clothe and baby you are the crazy one I want for life. You made this moment !
I love your gift so much ! Why do you think even after it unfortunatelly broke, I still have the picture behind my phone ?
This christmas was wonderful. Actually, the best one ever for me. You decide to pass this end of the year with me instead of your family. You made me fall for you so hard !
THE BEST NEW YEAR EVER ! You just transform me that day, when I think about this day I cry now when I think about it because I felt happy like never before.
Do you remember that scene ? You call me and I was under the shower.
After breaking up, we gonna come back together and we gonna buy my first guitar !
Our first trip to Baguio, we starting to be really in our own world. You are so cute.
It was a nice trip Bebe. If you were not coming it would have been really different.
The moment you notice the tabo was really funny ! See I am becoming asian.
The first time we went to a breakout room. I love this picture because we are both laughting out loud.
You stare at me a lot when I sleep. Thank you to take care of me even when I sleep.
You made me happy everyday as you can see on this picture. I have a big smile and playing loco loco.
We went to the birthday of Dabe and it was the first time I hear you singing on a karaoke. You have a nice voice.
I take even more PTO for enjoying my time with you.
I gave your name to my guitar and sign it.
I improved slowly following your teaching.
You are so sexy my sweetheart. I hope I could be the guitar here.
You managed to capture non only this picture where I am truly happy but my heart too.
This picture make me think to much about a wedding picture.
We kissed in the middle of the LGBT event in Manila. It's like the time stopped.
First time, I went to the chinatown of Manila. Discovering every places with you was so nice. You made everything unforgettable !
Another night out in BGC, I did not ended up completely drunk this time.
First time, my little baby went to work in Manila. A big step !
I dont mind being ridiculous for other because it always makes you smile ! That's what is important for me.
Hydro Manila ! It was fun and I am sorry I ruin the event by getting made at you for my phone destroyed. It will never happen again.
The day our favorite mirror get installed. Did you like it ?
Apparently, yes.
I am always here for you when you are crying like this day. Count on me baby, I will always try to help you.
Haa this bus ! Do you remember what happen inside ?
Happy Birthday Sweetheart ! You did not even notice me preparing everything for it. It's an important date for me !
Subic was really a nice trip. The sunset, the tent ! Mwah, unforgettable ! You are crazy and I love it.
I wonder how many times did we go to Megamall together ? But with you, it was always interesting.
Our matching tattoo. I love it, it belongs to only us. Would you be ok to have another one together ?
When you thought I was waiting you at home ? When I was actually waiting you at the airport for hours. I actually walk to the airport from Mandaluyong. Impressive, right ?
When you dont expect it, I always sent you stupid picture.
At that time, I was already comploting for making my proposal. Yes, It was around the moment I totally made my mind.
First time you saw me wearing corporate clothe. How is it baby ? Do I look nice ?
Our first Christmas together. You gave me certainly the most incredible gift ever given to me. You were pregnant and you gonna make me a Dad.
This year was A-M-A-Z-I-N-G ! I wanna see all the next following new year with you and our childrens.
